trait.name: Proficiencies
trait.text: You gain proficiency in the History and Perception skills.
You are also proficient with alchemist's supplies and any one artisan's tool of your choice.

trait.name: Smoke Powder Familiarity
trait.text: You are proficient with firearms and explosives
In addition, you can use your proficiency with alchemist's supplies to craft smokepowder.

trait.name: Starting Equipment
trait.text: A holy symbol (a gift to you when you entered the priesthood), a prayer book or prayer wheel, 5 sticks of incense, vestments, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 15 gp
